metadata.title: Lily's Extra Capacity
metadata.author: msbinarylily
metadata.description:
Are you a hoarder? Is 3 augment and 4 cargo slots not enough for you.
In which case this mini-addon is just for you!
Increases augment slots by 3 and cargo slots by 4 - and can be patched multiple times if you want even more!
Needed to be pathed after (below) mods that adds ships - otherwise ships added below this mod won't be affected!
